title: The Unmask IAM Permission: API Gateway Access Logging
summary: Unlock the secrets to securing your AWS environment! Learn the intricacies of IAM permissions and how to protect your Amazon API Gateway access logs.

title: Leveraging Virtual Reality to Enhance Diversity and Inclusion training at Google
summary: This case-study explores the effectiveness of virtual reality (VR) for diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) training through the lens of a custom VR application developped to train Google employees.
